subject: Re: [junit] How to write a single test case with a sequence of multiple, varying input?
msgSnippet: ... That doesn t sound like the usual way to use JUnit. Have you looked into Fit (http://fit.c2.com/)? Robert
messageBody:
On Tuesday 10 October 2006 07:59, Kunal Ashar wrote:
> I'm trying to author a JUnit-based test scenario where the input to a
> single test case is a file name. However, the test case needs to
> recursively run against, say, the names of all the files in a folder
> and its subfolders.

That doesn't sound like the usual way to use JUnit.
Have you looked into Fit (http://fit.c2.com/)?

Robert
